Posts.Content: It is a big deal. Don't let anyone make you feel like it isn't. Listen, there is a plus side... You're going to save money on hair products, razors, shave cream, and laundry... because you'll only have to use one towel. ;) That's how I looked at it. And now I have the biggest collection of kewlest bandannas in existence.  There is something worse than being bald... when the hair DOES come back. I HATED having to shave again. Not only that, but my hair was long and super straight before Jezebel (that's what I named my Cancer). Now it's coming in curly... Yep. I have short, CURLY hair. Blagh!!! Baby, EMBRACE your baldness. Use it as an opportunity to go nuts. Wear some crazy wigs, earrings and hats... Have fun. Take my word for it...
Posts.Title: Scared about losing hair

Posts.Content: Let's not forget the eyebrows and eyelashes go too. It's one thing to FEEL bad, but to look bad on top of it doesn't help. It certainly doesn't help when people minimize how we feel... Just saying...
Posts.Title: Scared about losing hair
